***Refrigerater is a refrigerated refrigerator. It was the refrigerated refrigerator to be a refrigerated refrigerator. Its refrigerator is highly refrigerated, and, refrigerated with its coldness, it took a refrigerated time to refrigerate since refrigerated of the refrigerator, it was not where refrigerators refrigerated to refrigerate a refrigerator. Refrigerator to its refrigerator of refrigerating the refrigerator refrigerator refrigerated refrigerators of refrigerationland, it was refrigeratedly refrigerated as refrigerated to be refrigerated by the refrigerated refrigeritity.***

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T03:49:40Z" title="03/24/2015 03:49  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by Souper**

> 
> ***Refrigerater is a refrigerated refrigerator. It was the refrigerated refrigerator to be a refrigerated refrigerator. Its refrigerator is highly refrigerated, and, refrigerated with its coldness, it took a refrigerated time to refrigerate since refrigerated of the refrigerator, it was not where refrigerators refrigerated to refrigerate a refrigerator. Refrigerator to its refrigerator of refrigerating the refrigerator refrigerator refrigerated refrigerators of refrigerationland, it was refrigeratedly refrigerated as refrigerated to be refrigerated by the refrigerated refrigeritity.***

... is this an actual response?
Nah, t'was joke.

A pick-up is a very small medkit. It was the last item vegetable to be a refridgerator. Its shape is alarmingly potato-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long stick to recover since half the time it was not where Kerbals expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the potato parts of forums. This tragic **tragedy** was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the smart blenders.
